attributes.action: Improve the parking on Milton Street and the surrounding areas.
attributes.additional_details: We want Maidstone Borough Council and the councillors of Fant Ward to identify the problem and work together to find a solution as quickly as possible.
attributes.background: Milton street and the surrounding roads are clogged up with excessive car, vans and lorries leaving it impossible to park as a resident. The local council (Maidstone) has spent the past 10 years promising to improve the parking situation and nothing has been done.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local parking is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
